remarks: Write the coset relation for the stabilizer subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
gasta.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gasta.2 $e |- H = { u e. X | ( u .(+) A ) = A } $.
orbsta.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG H ) $.
gastacos $p |- ( ( ( .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) /\ A e. Y ) /\ ( B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( B .~ C <-> ( B .(+) A ) = ( C .(+) A ) ) ) $.
$d .(+) u $.
$d A u $.
$d B u $.
$d C u $.
$d G u $.
$d X u $.
